name: @opencrvs/integration
description: A set of integration and performance tests for OpenCRVS

scripts.start: yarn build && docker run -v `pwd`/build:/build -i loadimpact/k6 run /build/k6-registration.js
scripts.start:once: yarn build && docker run -v `pwd`/build:/build -i loadimpact/k6 run /build/k6-registration.js -u 1 -i 1
